name: eslint-test-spruce
description: Tests for the Spruce Lint packages

scripts.test.fail:
cd src/lint-samples/; for d in fail-*; do echo " 
 
Trying $d
Expecting errors" ; eslint $d; if [ $? -ne 1 ]; then echo FAILED: $d; exit 1; fi; echo "ğŸ‘
 "; done
scripts.test.pass:
cd src/lint-samples/; for d in pass-*; do echo " 
 
Trying $d
Expecting success"; eslint $d; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo FAILED: $d; exit 1; fi; echo "ğŸ‘
 "; done
